name: LAN_GamePack
description:
Hello visitor!

This game is made of 2 individual games - "Drawing and guessing" game and card game "Prší" that known in some countries.

These games are made for LAN experience, especially where you can't rely on signal or internet connection. You can simply play on LAN network or mobile hotspot. Yes, it is cross-platform.

I provide 2 versions - Windows and Android( 8.0+). 

 Feel free to vote in my strawpool to give me feedback on this game, it is also appreciated. 

https://strawpoll.com/polls/QrgebmRqRZ
